posts.post_content:
I directed a lot of time on the Baltimore team over the last 5 years. I’ve decided to change gears and focus on some other areas. I’ll be posting a number of Baltimore cards over the coming days. Some raw some graded all different backs. If these sell I’ll continue to post more. 

Prices are net to me and include shipping. PayPal FF preferred (add 3% for goods)
Any questions just ask. Any issues let me know and we’ll take care of it. 
I can send better pictures if needed.

4 raw cards to start: 
Jimmy Jackson Piedmont - SOLD
Phil Poland Piedmont - SOLD
Jack Dunn Sweet Caporal 350/30 - SOLD
Jimmy Slagle Sovereign - SOLD - difficult combo - creases and measures slightly short

Thanks for looking

It's possible we just set a record for internet transaction speed. He posted this at 4 o'clock yesterday, we had a deal by 4:30, cards were at my house by noon today! Turns out we live a few miles from each other and he dropped them at my door.

Thanks Tony for the super easy transaction and great cards.

That’s awesome
